summary: MY CAR HAS 75,000 MILES ON IT. I'M 6 MONTHS PREGNANT, DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE, WHEN THE VEHICLE'S TRANSMISSION STARTS TO SLIP. DURING THE SLIP, A "TRANSMISSION MALFUNCTION. SERVICE NOW" LIGHT COMES ON AND MY CAR PROCEEDS TO LOCK UP AND STALL AT INTERSTATE SPEEDS. THREE DIFFERENT CARS ALMOST CRASHED INTO MY OWN BEFORE I COULD GET SAFELY TO THE SHOULDER. WHY IS THIS HAPPENING TO A CAR LESS THAN 10 YEARS OLD,  AT 75,000 MILES?
